Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Ignition system misfire. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 04/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
